[ C ] one of the positions of the body used in yoga: The downward dog is a posture or "asana" used in yoga. In this branch of yoga, each asana is joined to the next to create a flowing series of movements.
[ U ] the part of yoga that consists of holding the body in different positions: Asana (the physical practice) is only one part of yoga. Hatha yoga includes asana (physical postures), pranayama (breath control), and deep relaxation.
